#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,found,*a,i,k,max,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		found=0;
		k=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		a=new int[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		sort(a,a+n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]==a[i+1])
			k++;
			else
			{
				if(k+1>(n/2))
				{
					found=1;
					max=a[i];
					break;
				}
				k=0;        //     1 1 1 2 3 5 5 5 6 6 6 6 6
			}
		}
		if(found==0)
		{
			if(k+1>(n/2))
			printf("%d\n",a[n-1]);
			else
			printf("NO MAJOR\n");
		}
		else
		printf("%d\n",max);
	}
}
